peer-to-peer web

  • Apr 3, 2019

    Meetup#5 Server Co-op Stage 2

    Since July 2018, Agorama has been investigating the possibilities of peer-2-peer (p2p) network infrastructure, while striving to establish a distributive autonomous network of platforms for creative exploration.
